pages.text: Blessed Water can be obtained from max level Clerics. When drank, it grants Blood Protection, which damages vampires whenever they feed on you. When thrown, however, it will not only grant Blood Protection to any living things it hits, it will also damage any undead creatures.
While it does deal less damage than an Instant Damage or Instant Health potion would, it works on vampires, while the other two do not.
